procurement_office_address: ACC - New Jersey, Center for Contracting and Commerce, Building 10 Phipps RD, Picatinny Arsenal, NJ 07806-5000
title: S--Laundry/Linen Services - Fort Devens MA
description: The Government intends to award a firm-fixed price contract for laundry service at Fort Devens, MA. The NAICS Code is 812320, FSC is S209. This is 100% set-aside for small businesses. Period of performance is a base year plus three option periods. Only one award will be made. Solicitation will be available via the Army Single Face to Industry (ASFI). Solicitation may be accessed by going to https://acquisition.army.mil/asfi/, click on contracting opportunities search, enter W15QKN% in the solicitation search; click on the solicitation number, the solicitation that you're looking for should be at the bottom of the page. See block # 8 of solicitation for the offer due/closing date. Contractors are required to submit completed past performance questionnaire along with their proposals. Questionnaire will be posted along with solicitation. Interested companies are advised to check the website periodically for solicitation and for any amendments. To be eligible for award, quoters must have a current, valid Central Contractor Registration at time of award, https://www.sam.gov.
specific_address: Central Receiving Point DOL Supply IPBO Warehouse, Buidg 3574, 12 Feinber Devens MA

industry: 561790: Other Services to Buildings and Dwellings
procurement_office_address: ACC - New Jersey, Center for Contracting and Commerce, Building 10 Phipps RD, Picatinny Arsenal, NJ 07806-5000
title: S--Snow and Ice Removal Services Portsmouth NH
description: The government requires snow and ice removal services for a base period of 12 months beginning 1 September 2014, or subsequent date of award, plus four, one-year option periods. The contractor shall provide the personnel, materials and equipment necessary to provide snow/ice removal services to 1LT Paul A. Doble ARC, 145 West Road & 125 Cottage Street, Portsmouth NH 03801. The contractor shall complete the tasks as defined in the performance work statement. A single fixed price requirements type contract shall be made as a result of the solicitation. The solicitation is for commercial services in accordance with FAR Part 12, pursuant to FAR 13.500 Test Program for Certain Commercial Items. This procurement is set aside 100% to small business. All other firms are deemed ineligible to submit offers. The NAICS Code for this procurement is 561790, which has a small business size standard of $7.5 million. Interested offerors are encouraged to be registered in the System for Award Management (SAM). To register your company in SAM, go to https://www.sam.gov/portal/public/SAM/ The solicitation will be available on or about 1 August 2014. No telephone requests will be accepted. Point of contact for this action is Claudia Adams, Army Contracting Command New Jersey, Fort Dix NJ, claudia.m.adams.civ@mail.mil

procurement_office_address: BLDG 2451 110 W ENT ST STE 200 FAIRCHILD AFB WA 99011-8568
title: This is a presolicitation notice for the supply and servicing of portable toilets to Fairchild AFB, Washington
contact: Ed Campbell, Contracting Officer, Phone 509-247-1970, Fax 509-247-8685, Email edward.campbell.2@us.af.mil - William T. Forde, Contract Specialist, Phone 5092478082, Email william.forde@us.af.mil
description: This is a presolicitation notice for the supply and subsequent servicing of portable toilets to Fairchild AFB, WA. This requirement is issued as a total small business set-aside and will be solicited under solicitation number FA4620-14-Q-A011.
